name: SKINNER HAS WEAPONS
description:
Skinner Box is not a simple cube, it has weapons to show and wants to demonstrate who it is.

  • CONTROLS

WASD (or arrows): Move.
Left click: Action, get weapon, SHOOT!!!
Right click: THROW WEAPON!!!

  • MUSIC

Tittle screen: Dubstep - Bensound.com

Levels:  Drop the bomb - Far Too Loud (https://soundcloud.com/far-too-loud)

P.S. If you want to make a gameplay with this game, please record it without playing it before.

P.P.S. DISCLAIMER (READ THIS BEFORE PURCHASE IT): This game will dissapoint you.
